tilesmallfont
{
	ignoreoffsets
	spacewidth 5
	
	! #02822
	"\"" #02823
	# #02824
	$ #02825
	% #02826
	& #02827
	' #02828
	( #02829
	) #02830
	* #02831
	+ #02832
	, #02833
	- #02834
	. #02835
	/ #02836
	0 #02837
	1 #02838
	2 #02839
	3 #02840
	4 #02841
	5 #02842
	6 #02843
	7 #02844
	8 #02845
	9 #02846
	: #02847
	; #02848
	< #02849
	= #02850
	> #02851
	? #02852
	@ #02853
	A #02854
	B #02855
	C #02856
	D #02857
	E #02858
	F #02859
	G #02860
	H #02861
	I #02862
	J #02863
	K #02864
	L #02865
	M #02866
	N #02867
	O #02868
	P #02869
	Q #02870
	R #02871
	S #02872
	T #02873
	U #02874
	V #02875
	W #02876
	X #02877
	Y #02878
	Z #02879
	[ #02880
	\\ #02881
	] #02882
	^ #02883
	_ #02884
	` #02885
	a #02886
	b #02887
	c #02888
	d #02889
	e #02890
	f #02891
	g #02892
	h #02893
	i #02894
	j #02895
	k #02896
	l #02897
	m #02898
	n #02899
	o #02900
	p #02901
	q #02902
	r #02903
	s #02904
	t #02905
	u #02906
	v #02907
	w #02908
	x #02909
	y #02910
	z #02911
	"-{" #02912
	| #02913
	"-}" #02914
	~ #02915
}

tilebigfont
{
	ignoreoffsets
	spacewidth 5
	
	! #03004
	"\"" #03022
	% #03009
	' #03022
	, #03003
	. #03002
	/ #03008
	0 #02930
	1 #02931
	2 #02932
	3 #02933
	4 #02934
	5 #02935
	6 #02936
	7 #02937
	8 #02938
	9 #02939
	: #03007
	; #03006
	? #03005
	A #02940
	B #02941
	C #02942
	D #02943
	E #02944
	F #02945
	G #02946
	H #02947
	I #02948
	J #02949
	K #02950
	L #02951
	M #02952
	N #02953
	O #02954
	P #02955
	Q #02956
	R #02957
	S #02958
	T #02959
	U #02960
	V #02961
	W #02962
	X #02963
	Y #02964
	Z #02965
	\\ #03008
	` #03022
}

smallfont2
{
	ignoreoffsets
	kerning 1
	minluminosity 0
	spacewidth 3
	
	! #03072
	"\"" #03073
	# #03074
	$ #03075
	% #03076
	& #03077
	' #03078
	( #03079
	) #03080
	* #03081
	+ #03082
	, #03083
	- #03084
	. #03085
	/ #03086
	0 #03087
	1 #03088
	2 #03089
	3 #03090
	4 #03091
	5 #03092
	6 #03093
	7 #03094
	8 #03095
	9 #03096
	: #03097
	; #03098
	< #03099
	= #03100
	> #03101
	? #03102
	@ #03103
	A #03104
	B #03105
	C #03106
	D #03107
	E #03108
	F #03109
	G #03110
	H #03111
	I #03112
	J #03113
	K #03114
	L #03115
	M #03116
	N #03117
	O #03118
	P #03119
	Q #03120
	R #03121
	S #03122
	T #03123
	U #03124
	V #03125
	W #03126
	X #03127
	Y #03128
	Z #03129
	[ #03130
	\\ #03131
	] #03132
	^ #03133
	_ #03134
	` #03135
	a #03104
	b #03105
	c #03106
	d #03107
	e #03108
	f #03109
	g #03110
	h #03111
	i #03112
	j #03113
	k #03114
	l #03115
	m #03116
	n #03117
	o #03118
	p #03119
	q #03120
	r #03121
	s #03122
	t #03123
	u #03124
	v #03125
	w #03126
	x #03127
	y #03128
	z #03129
	"-{" #03162
	| #03163
	"-}" #03164
	~ #03165
}

digifont
{
	ignoreoffsets
	minluminosity 0
	0 #02472
	1 #02473
	2 #02474
	3 #02475
	4 #02476
	5 #02477
	6 #02478
	7 #02479
	8 #02480
	9 #02481
}

indexfont
{
	ignoreoffsets
	minluminosity 0
	% #03076
	/ #03021
	0 #03010
	1 #03011
	2 #03012
	3 #03013
	4 #03014
	5 #03015
	6 #03016
	7 #03017
	8 #03018
	9 #03019
	: #03020
}
